1.title: Full Stack Developer
1.description: Supervised Professional Practice at Livepanel where I developed frontend tasks with Angular and backend with Python using Django.
achievements: Development of modern user interfaces with Angular.
Implementation of REST APIs with Django and Python.
Integration of frontend and backend for complete web applications.
Application of best practices in Full Stack development.

2.title: Information Systems Engineering
2.description: Information Systems Engineering degree with focus on the entire software lifecycle from planning to development and maintenance.
achievements: 28 out of 34 subjects approved to date.
